page.title: 03A NEW FAMILY IN BIRSTALL
page.content: We moved here a month ago because my Dad, who is a manager, was getting tired of driving down here every day from{Chesterfield.}We had only one car, a Cortina, which was expensive to run. At 8.30 on Sunday, we get up, eat breakfast and drive to Chesterfield on the M1 in our{Morris 1000.}We go to my auntie's and my nanan's house. After lunch we go to the Parish Church Cricket Club. I am the scorer until 3.20 when I make the teas and my friend takes over the scoring. This has caused some interest at my new school because I am a girl and I know more about cricket than the boys! At 6.00 the game ends and we all go to the{Cricketer's Inn.}Later we have a sandwich at my nanan's and by 7.30 we are back on the motorway to Leicester.
